basics.name: Carlos Henrique Mourato Alves
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a technology enthusiast, passionate about the art of programming. With over five years of experience in the field, I focus my expertise on software development, with contributions in the banking, financial, and management sectors.

work.summary: Full Stack Developer at Banco do Brasil
highlights: Analyze, develop and implement demands from the front-end and back-end of the Derivatives team, delivering solutions and better experiences to bank users in individual self-service via mobile and web
Optimize efficiency for the bank's employees through the back-office system, the BB Platform

work.summary: Delphi Developer Freelancer at Protec Sistemas
highlights: Analyze, develop and implement the new customer management system focusing on care and funeral plans and services, making this system available on desktop and web platforms

work.summary: Full Stack Developer at Caixa Econômica Federal bank.
highlights: Analyze, develop and implement front-end and back-end demands of various public portals and internal systems

work.summary: Full Stack Developer at BRB Bank
highlights: Analyze, develop, implement and document back-end demands of the BRB Mobile and Nação BRB FLA applications
Full-Stack development of a back-office web system, focused on controlling and managing the opening of bank accounts
